Beaverton.Edison High School (Portland, Oregon): Edison High School is a small (90 students) private high school in Portland, Oregon, United States. Edison High School empowers students with learning differences to experience academic success and personal growth while preparing them for a productive future. Edison High School is open to students who have learning differences such as Dyslexia, Attention Deficit Disorder (ADD), Attention Deficit Hyperactivity Disorder (ADHD), Tourette syndrome, Dysgraphia, Dyscalculia, Visual Perception and Nonverbal Learning Disorders.
